Summary: A strange boat was going very fast SW the disc behind it
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Laguna Beach
There were no other sightings in Laguna Beach on or around May 6th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming up my stairs to my home. I have a clear view of Catalina Island. I heard boat slapping on the ocean and I saw the shape and did not recall seeing a boat like that so I snapped a couple of pictures. When I downloaded them I saw the black object behind the boat. I felt that the disc was chasing this boat. I don't know why but that is what I felt.
